column1: oooh bounce first up. On a length, moving away from Parthiv and bounces almost shoulder high while going past him. Parthiv has a waft at it, but the ball is much above bat
good bounce again, on a good length and angling across the left-hander, bounces above his bat again, with Parthiv trying to steer it away
keeps this fuller, but still well outside off, Parthiv goes for a big drive and misses
flicked off the pads to deep square leg where Ingram does well to slide and stop the ball. Ishant strayed in line that time and allowed Parthiv to get going
too full and on the pads, easy picking for Parthiv, just plays a nice little pick-up shot with great timing, sending it to the midwicket boundary
slower ball, just short of yorker length outside off, Parthiv strokes it nicely but straight to cover

just past a widish slip that bounce is doing its work. Great length from Morris and gets it to rise uncomfortably high. Kohli wanted to steer it away, gets it high on the bat. Dhawan at a wide slip dives to his right but the ball just eludes him
fuller on the stumps, and Kohli taps it towards mid-on to get off strike
back of a length again but that one didn't bounce as much. Parthiv rocked back, looking to pull but gets an under-edge to deep square leg
too full, half-volley on the pads, and clipped to deep square leg with his wrists
top edges a pull shot but it falls safe, well in front of deep midwicket. Back of length on leg stump, he was giving himself room and Morris followed him, so he was a bit cramped for room.
strays down leg and that will be a wide
taken at third man this was bowled wide of off stump and Parthiv had a slash at it, gets it off the toe end where it loops high in the air and settles into third man's hands.
fullish on the pads, turned to short fine leg
good length outside off, pushed towards cover
chipped it in the air, and towards mid-on, but the ball didn't travel enough. Slower ball, full on leg stump and AB was too early into his flick. Well disguised by Ishant
length outside off, Kohli walks across and works it to midwicket's right for a quick single
another slower ball, length outside off, AB was looking for the slap through the off side but ends up under-edging towards leg gully
stands in his crease to square drive it, but again no timing. Bounces to cover
forcing shot off the back foot to a length ball on off, but Axar moves to his left quickly at cover to cut it off
and that's another one that has bounced extra. back o fa length outside off, AB wanted to flay it through the off side but it goes well over his bat
yorker length on off, driven back straight, the bowler stops it with his boot
he's away! short of a length on middle stump, he spotted it early and went on the back foot to pull this over midwicket. Was a bit cramped for room, but he made sweet connection anyway
back of a length coming into him a touch, AB moves a little across and fends it down

run out chance missed too full outside off and AB drives it powerfully, but straight to extra cover. Sets off for a run and the fielder takes aim and throws, but misses the stumps. No one backing up but they don't take the overthrow because AB's momentum took him very far down the bowler's end too. Shreyas Iyer the fielder
slowed down the pace again, fullish outside off, but AB waits for it this time and strokes it between cover and extra cover
on a length, very straight, Kohli walks across and tucks it to deep square leg
fullish on leg stump, tucked to midwicket
a bit late on that, and the leading edge rolls towards point. Kohli was looking to go across and clip it into the legside again, but this was at 138 kph, and he brought his bat down a touch late
over the top, but mis-timed. length ball outside off, bounces a bit more again and AB gets the toe-end while trying to go over cover. Clears the in-field but the ball stops well short of the boundary
beautiful dances down the track and converts this back of length ball into almost a half-volley outside off and drives through cover with a punchy sound, splitting the fielders perfectly.
fuller outside off, punched to cover
too full on the stumps and clipped nicely off his toes but straight to midwicket
Slower ball strays on the pads and Kohli turns him to deep square leg.
fullish length outside off, he waits for it and steers it to third man off an open bat face
length ball outside off, guided to short third man's right for a single
slower ball goes off radar, down leg and he'll have to bowl that one again

caught at long-on another slower ball on the stumps, AB went for the straight drive down the ground. Gets it off the toe-end, and the ball doesn't travel, Ingram runs back and takes it. South Africa bowler, batsman and fielder.
fuller on middle and leg, whipped between mid-on and midwicket
fullish on the stumps, patted down to long-on
length on off, pushed back
flat, full on the stumps, patted back
gets this outside off and he stands to drive, but straight to cover
arm ball, came in with the angle and he doesn't pick it. Inside edge onto pad
full ball outside off, pushed to point and they take a quick single
full fast and quick, 150 kph but full toss on off, pushed into the offside
back of a length outside off, he stays still in his crease and steers it to third man
bounce again, off a length and rising up to almost shoulder level. Stoinis gets behind it and defends it down
oh that seemed to slip out of his hand a bit, ends up as a full toss just below the waist on leg stump. Turned to midwicket

short and quick, Kohli wanted to pull it but was very late on it, gets it off the end of the bat and it loops up and falls just behind Rabada. Wasn't in control of that at all, but got enough on it to not be at catching height for the bowler
given some air outside off, Kohli drives with a flourish but doesn't quite get the timing. Ball goes to deep extra cover
length ball outside off, he punches off the back foot past point
flatter on the pads, clipped to deep square leg
floated up on the stumps, driven to long-off
given some air again and Kohli takes a confident stride out to drive to long-off's left
fired into the pads and tapped down to long-on by giving himself room
greeted with a six over long-on remarkable pick up shot, too full and he gets a free swing of the arms to drive it in the air and well over the fence
shortens his length a bit and Stoinis stays back to punch it, but cover is there and no single available
fuller again, well outside off, another free-flowing drive, but not as well timed. Long-off fields
good length outside off, Kohli gets down low and steers to short third man's left
fuller, prods forward but it takes the inside edge to midwicket
fullish outside off, driven to long-on
length ball on middle, and he pulls off the back foot. Protection in the deep though
length ball, just outside off, and he punches a shot to deep extra cover
length ball, just outside off, and he rocks back to flat-bat a shot down the ground to long on

in the air and taken at long on! Back of a length, outside off stump, and he looks to pull off the back foot. Flat-batted over Kohli, but it doesn't have the elevation to beat long on. Taken by Tewatia
slower through the air, full on leg stump. Tapped back to Axar
full on leg, and Moeen tries to work it towards the leg side. Mistimed on this occasion
full on leg, and he drives with the legbreak to long off. Walks across for a single
full on off, and he prods forward to drive with the bat's open face. Played to cover point for a quick single
length ball, just outside off, and he stays on the back foot to punch down to long on
full on middle, and he shuffles across the stumps, before working a shot towards square leg
whipped down the ground, but there's a man at long off. Juicy full ball outside off, and Kohli's disappointed not finding the gap
full on off, and tapped off the front foot to short cove. Fielder misfields, allowing them to pinch the single
deposited over cow corner! Full on leg, but Moeen chooses to skip down the ground to meet it. Whipped away off his toes, and this has gone over midwicket
full on off, and he tries to use his feet again. Slices an uppish drive over cover for a single
length ball, wide outside off, and he slaps a cut-shot to extra cover
back of a length on middle, and Kohli's cramped for space. Manages to pull to long on noetheless
full, wide outside off. Moeen came skipping down the wicket again, but he slaps this back to the bowler
length ball, wide outside off, and punched off the back foot to long off. Another timeout
pulled with disdain! Length ball, on leg stump, and he pulls off the front foot to the deep midwicket boundary. Just over the ropes!
yorker on off, and Moeen digs this away to cover point
back of a length, wide outside leg stump, and Moeen misses the pull. Through to the keeper
length ball on off, and he muscles a cut down to deep point. Gently played to Shaw in the deep
nearly a yorker outside off, and he opens the bat's face to squeeze a late cut through to the backward point boundary!
full, just outside off, and he digs this yorker away to deep point for a single
back of a length on off, and he ducks under the ball's line. Through to the keeper. Solid end to Ishant's bowling-spell
smacked over long off! Full, on off, and he skips down the wicket before hammering a golf-swing shot over the boundary
length ball, wide outside off, and the googly is cut away to cover point
beautifully done! Done in by the googly. Full on middle, flatter, and Moeen comes down the wicket again. Ball turns away from Moeen as he looks to slog towards the leg side, and Pant makes no mistake
paddled fine! Length ball on middle, and Nath goes down on one knee to meet the ball. Paddled past Pant's left, and fine leg is too square
overpitched, flighted on off, and he toe-ends a drive to mid-off
length ball, wide outside off, and he tries to play the drive. But he's too late into the shot, and it's taken a thick outside-edge to short third man
back of a length, on off, and he steers this off the back foot to point. Wants the single, but Kohli says no
length ball, landing outside off and angling in. Fended off the back foot to mid-on
back of a length, wide outside off, and he punches a back-foot shot to cover
slices a drive! Much needed boundary. Full, on middle, and he comes down the ground to meet the ball. Thumps a drive past cover's left
slower-ball yorker on off, and he mistimes an on-drive to long on
back of a length, wide outside off, and he tiptoes to cut through to deep point. Kohli keeps the strike
full on middle, and Kohli backs away to drive. Eventually chooses to defend towards cover

inside out to long off! Full, just outside off, and he drives this with the turn over the infield. Morris - at long off - runs forward to try and take the catch, but the ball falls just short and runs into the boundary. But Morris has injured his knee a bit while attempting that. Looks okay now
length ball, just outside off, and cut square to point
full on off, and he picks the googly well! Goes down on one knee, and swipes a shot over deep midwicket
over square leg now! Half-tracker on middle, and Kohli rocks back deep into his crease before pulling this over the fielder on the leg side
full on off, and he drives down the ground to long on. Keeps the strike again, and asks the dugout for a helmet

in the air and long on makes no mistake! Full on middle, and Kohli looks to lift this over the bowler's head. But Rabada's a quick bowler, and he's late into his shot. Iyer from long on runs to his left, and takes a difficult running catch in front of the sightscreen. Kohli is not happy at all!
guided past the keeper! Length ball, wide outside off, and the attempted late-cut is steered past Pant's right

once too many! Tries to guide this once again, but this time he can't play it past the keeper's right. Looks to steer this short ball to the third-man boundary again, but Pant runs to his right to complete the catch
yorker on off, and he gets his bat down in time to play towards point. Dug away
overpitched on middle, slower ball from Rabada, and Southee has no trouble in hammering a drive to long on

Pant appeals, and Rabada asks the umpire too! And the finger has been raised. Short ball, on leg, and Negi tries to ramp a shot over Pant's head. Ball takes a feather-edge off the bat's slice and Pant times his jump well to complete the catch. RCB paying the price for being too cute with the bat in this over
offcutter, wide outside off, and cut away to third man for a single
length ball on middle, angling into Siraj. Fended away to cover point off the back foot
full toss, just outside off, and Siraj tries to thump a drive through the off side. But he's through his shot too late, and the ball goes through into Pant's gloves
slower ball beamer! Tries to go for the yorker, but this one is aimed at Siraj's head. Manages to duck under it.
punched to long on
back of a length, on off, and he flat-bats a pull to long on. Lands just short of Tewatia near the boundary

yorker angling in from wide of the crease, and he tries to ramp this over the keeper's head after exposing all three stumps. He misses the shot, and the ball hits his left leg. Impact's in front of middle, and they've appealed for lbw. Umpire says out, but Siraj reviews! Replays show ball is crashing into leg stump
yorker on middle, and drilled to long on
back of a length on middle, and he manages to glove a pull to square leg. They scamper across for a single
back of a length on leg, and the batsman backs away to make some room. Bowler follows him, and he misses the leg-side swipe. Through to Pant
low full toss on leg stump, and he manages to clip this towards deep midwicket. Enough time to run back for the second

back of a length, slower ball on middle, and pulled over the infield to deep midwicket. Southee's coming back for a second, and dives into his crease, but Ingram's throw is poor so he may have survived. We need a TV replay to determine the run out, and Southee's in by milimetres!
no he can't. Yorker on middle, and slapped away to point. RCB finish on 149 for 8
some swing first up, away from Shaw, but in the slot to drive. Crisp one but straight to cover
straighter that time and pushed to mid-on for a single
caught at point Dhawan goes first ball, with a smart take by Saini. Invited the drive, cross-seam ball wide of off stump and Dhawan slices it. Saini takes a few steps back and holds it over his head
beautiful drive through point to get off the mark. Too full, Southee is getting some shape but the length was not on, perfect to drive. Chahal at point was also a little slow to get off his feet
length ball coming into him, jabbed back to the bowler
some shape into the right-hander now but strays down leg and it's a wide
down leg again and he'll have to bowl that one again too

edge dropped by Parthiv diving to his right length ball, teasing line outside off and he draws the poke. The ball wasn't travelling too fast and Parthiv had time to tumble to his right, got a glove to it, but couldn't hold on
yorker on off, dug out to mid-on
good length, coming back into him, pushed towards point for a quick single
peachy cover drive, but straight to the fielder at cover. Too full, in the slot, but gets away
yorker on off stump, carved to point
fuller on middle and leg, he backs away a bit and drives straight, but back to the bowler, who fields
good length, coming into him, pushed into the offside for a quick single
lovely clip off his pads for a four to deep midwicket. Southee getting the ball to move, but his lines are all over the place at the moment, this one ended up on the pads
poor line again from Southee, length ball on the pads, and he swivels to pull it off his hips. Had to beat short fine only and he did that, for another boundary
smashed fractionally short of a length outside off and he spotted it so early, was on the back foot and unleashes a peachy cut that screams across the turf
action replay! too much room outside off and too short again, Prithvi cuts it powerfully off the back foot once again and finds the point fence
five fours on the trot! This is leg-byes but bad lines by Southee on the pads and Shaw wanted to tickle it fine, gets the pad and runs away to the fence anyway
could have been six fours in the over, too full and Shaw cover drives off the front foot, but can't beat the fielder at cover. But 20 runs in the over and Capitals' chase is in full flow
given some air on off, pushed back to the bowler off the end of the bat
fuller, pushed to midwicket's right
flighted on middle and leg, Shaw gives himself room and drives it back past the bowler. Didn't try to hit it too hard, AB had to run around from long-off to slide and field
fuller on the stumps defended towards point.
drags it a bit short, he goes back and flicks to deep midwicket
flighted, and dips on him, he was giving him the charge, ends up inside edging to midwicket
back of a length on off, pushed to point. But he's over-stepped. Free hit coming up
poor ball to bowl on a free hit, full toss on the stumps and he just thumps it straight back past the bowler into the straight boundary
back of a length, coming into the batsman, who chops it down to third man
sharp bouncer, pacy and on target. Iyer ducks under it. 145 kph
fuller outside off, he went for a big heave but got an inside edge. But the outfield is so quick it races to the midwicket boundary. Unfortunate for the bowler
length on off, takes on hand off the bat to glance to the leg side.  Siraj hits the stumps direct, but Shaw had made his ground
another good bouncer, and he ducks under it
down the track and over the top. Chahal gave it some air, Iyer spotted it and was charging down, got to the pitch of the ball and lifted it straight over
flatter, hits him on the pads but that was going down leg
slider on off stump, he goes deep in his crease to cut to point
flighted on a length, he gives himself room and takes a big stride out, drives it back to the bowler
given some air and he blocks it back
a bit quicker, and he's caught on the crease, ends up jabbing it back. Great comeback by Chahal after a six off the first ball
some bounce, drifting on leg and turns a bit, he goes back in his crease to push this around the corner
flatter but down leg, bad lines again. Paddle-swept fine. Didn't get it off the middle, but didn't need to, the placement was spot on
flighted, full on the stumps, driven back to the bowler, who tumbles to his left and fields
length ball outside off, pushed off the front foot between cover and point
nice loop on the ball, he stays in his crease and punches to deep cover
given some air again, clipped off his toes to long-on
back of a length outside off, steered to point's left
fuller outside off, punched to a square third man

what a shot length ball outside off, and Iyer went deep in his crease and gave himself room, slapped it past point and into the fence. Was almost off balance, too heavy on the back foot but made such great connection it raced away
fuller on the stumps, pushed to mid-on
fuller on off, driven to mid-off. They decide against the single
full outside off, steered to third man
flatter on leg stump and Negi had a chance to run out Iyer. It was pushed towards mid-on, Negi ran across to field and fired in a throw. Would have been mighty close

caught off a top edge at deep square leg dragged it a bit short and Shaw wanted to pull that into the second tier, went on the back foot and was going hard at it, but only got a top edge that looped towards the fielder
ooh arm ball past the outside edge. went with the angle from around the wicket, and defeated Ingram's push
fuller outside off, pushed into the offside
shot it was not that far outside off, but Iyer gave himself room and cuts from close to the body.Timed beautifully to the point boundary
pushed back to the bowler
flat and on the stumps, blocked to cover
length ball, jabbed towards mid-off
fuller, gets it to dip and turn, takes the outside edge and gullyfields and fires in a quick throw. Ingram had to hurry back in his crease after looking for a run
flatter into him, and he punches to long-on
moves across the stumps and scoops it over short fine leg. Superbly placed, fine enough to beat fielders
length ball, pushed to midwicket
too far for Parthiv! Back of a length on middle, and Iyer's leg-side swipe takes a top-edge. Parthiv runs to his left to take a catch, but the ball falls just beyond him
length ball, wide outside off stump, and he lets the ball go through to the keeper
once again, back of a length wide outside off, and Ingram opts to let it go
fullish, wide outside off, and he slaps a flat cover drive over the boundary-line! Powerful

appeal for stumping but what was Ingram doing there? Pre-meditates to paddle this past the keeper's left, but since the ball was so wide he has to adjust. Looks to guide it past the keeper's right instead, but can't make the connection. Parthiv whips the bails off, but Ingram is in
full, outside off, and he caresses a drive to Nath at extra cover. Well stopped, full-stretched dive in the deep

slapped! Back of a length, wide outside off, and he allows the ball to turn into him before bringing out the late cut. Played past the fielder at short third man, and that's another boundary for Ingram
full, just wide outside off, and he drives down the ground to long on for a walking single
length ball angling into Ingram's body as he skips down the wicket. Mistimes a flick to the leg side
full on off, and drifting into middle stump. Another mistimed shot - a drive - to cover
length ball on leg, and nudged off his hips to square leg
length ball on middle, and nudged off his waist to square leg this time
length ball, just outside off, and punched to extra cover for a single
full on off, and he goes down on one knee to sweep. Played behind square, and the diving Negi cannot stop the boundary. Hundred for Delhi
full outside leg stump, and turning into his pads. Mistimes a defensive shot
faster one, skidder on leg stump, and flicked fine to fine leg
full on leg, and clipped off his toes to the fielder at deep square leg
full, wide outside off stump, and the ball turns further away. Left alone
full, wide outside off and turning further away. Iyer goes for an expansive drive, but misses
length ball, wide outside off, and cut square off the back foot to the point boundary!

big appeal, and given! They consider reviewing, but Iyer asks Ingram to walk! Good decision. Length ball on middle, and Ingram shuffled across - exposing all three stumps - to ramp a shot over the leg side. He misses, and ball hits his back leg. Easy decision for umpire S Ravi
full, on off stump, and tapped away to the leg side for a quick single
length ball, wide outside off, and he muscles a cut to Nath at deep point. Comes back for the second, and that's Iyer's half-century!
length ball, just wide outside off, and guided off the back foot to point
length ball, just outside off, and chipped over the non-striker to long off. Southee does well to field that near the practice wickets
length ball on middle, and tapped off the back foot the bowler
full, just outside off, and gently tapped to cover. They take off for a single, and the throw from there also goes for overthrows. Yikes
full on leg, and he backs away to cut a shot to cover. Stopped by the fielder there
back of a length on middle, but going down leg. Iyer ducks under, and happily collects the wide
back of a length on middle. Iyer backs away and cuts behind square to third man. Ball lands in front of Siraj, spins awkwardly on the bounce, and he makes a mess of that in the deep. Oh dear!
full on middle, and driven off his toes to midwicket. Stopped by the infielder
on his toes, and flicked behind square to deep backward for a single
full on middle, and he sticks his bat out to guide this down to third man
full on off, and he goes down on one knee to slog. Mistimed to deep backward square, but hey, there's no fielder there!
full, wide outside off, and he mistimes a slog to deep midwicket
length ball on off, and flicked off his hips to deep midwicket for a single
full on off, and he walks down the wicket before drilling a shot to long on
length ball on off, and tapped off the back foot to long on
length ball, wide outside off, and cut away to deep extra cover
length ball, wide outside leg, and skidding through. Left alone
length ball, wide outside off, and cut off the back foot to deep point
length ball, wide outside of, and he reaches towards the ball to muscle a cut. Placed past point, and there are big gaps at the boundary there. No fielder bothered moving
tossed up on leg, and he mistimes a sweep to square leg
length ball, wide outside off and turning in slightly. Pant shoulders his arms, but that's not a wide
full, outside leg, and he sweeps to deep backward square
hammered! Full, tossed up outside off, and Iyer has sent this into the second tier. Proper swing of the bat, and clubbed over long-off for six
back of a length on middle, and pulled off the back foot to deep midwicket
back of a length on middle, and nudged off his hips to square leg

splices the pull! And Chahal takes a catch at short cover. Back of a length on off, and the attempted pull flies off the bat's edge. But wait, has Saini overstepped? Backfoot is on the line, it all depends on the umpire's interpretation. That's out, reckons the TV umpire. Gone after a classy 67
back of a length on off, and the ball goes over the batsman's shoulders
back of a length on off, and the attempted pull is mistimed to mid-on
taken at mid off! Back of a length, on off, and he backs away to punch. Flies off the bat's top-half, and AB de Villiers holds on. Again they're checking for the no-ball, but Saini is fine
length ball, wide outside off, and he clubs a shot to extra cover. Enough time to come back for the second run
another one! Can Delhi avoid another collapse? Kohli's smiling, a rare sight today. Length ball angling across, and the back-foot swipe can't clear mid off
back of a length, just outside off, and he tries to guide this over the keeper's head. Can't get the connection. Soft appeal for caught behind, but they choose not to review. Rightly so
length ball outside off, and clubbed to deep point for a walking single
there's the winning runs! Full, just outside off, and Axar drives over cover to collect the two points. Delhi Capitals win by 4 wickets. RCB go 0-6
